content.question: Which of the following best characterizes artistic movements in late-nineteenth-century Europe?

choices.label: An increased emphasis on personal expression
A return to the restraint and symmetry of classical forms
A rejection of nature as a subject
Renewed dependence on royal and aristocratic patrons

content.answer: An increased emphasis on personal expression

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
